Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Fine Arts[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Provides a free Scriptorium, Gallery, and Conservatory in your first 4 cities. Amphitheaters, Opera Houses, Museums, and Broadcast Towers increase city [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism output by 25%.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Fine Arts[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Provides a free Scriptorium, Gallery, and Conservatory in your first 4 cities. Amphitheaters, Opera Houses, Museums, and Broadcast Towers increase city [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism output by 25%.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](PL_PL text) [ENDCOLOR][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Fine Arts[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Provides a free Scriptorium, Gallery, and Conservatory in your first 4 cities. Amphitheaters, Opera Houses, Museums, and Broadcast Towers increase city [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism output by 25%.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](RU_RU text) [ENDCOLOR][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Fine Arts[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Provides a free Scriptorium, Gallery, and Conservatory in your first 4 cities. Amphitheaters, Opera Houses, Museums, and Broadcast Towers increase city [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism output by 25%.
Scriptorium
Civilizations that adopt Fine Arts will receive a Scriptorium in their first 4 cities, which provides 1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture as well as a Writer Specialist Slot.
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]Scriptorium

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]Civilizations that adopt Fine Arts will receive a Scriptorium in their first 4 cities, which provides 1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture as well as a Writer Specialist Slot.
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](PL_PL text) [ENDCOLOR]Scriptorium

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](PL_PL text) [ENDCOLOR]Civilizations that adopt Fine Arts will receive a Scriptorium in their first 4 cities, which provides 1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture as well as a Writer Specialist Slot.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](RU_RU text) [ENDCOLOR]Civilizations that adopt Fine Arts will receive a Scriptorium in their first 4 cities, which provides 1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture as well as a Writer Specialist Slot.
Gallery
Civilizations that adopt Fine Arts will receive a Gallery in their first 4 cities, which provides 1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness as well as an Artist Specialist Slot.
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]Gallery

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](RU_RU text) [ENDCOLOR]Civilizations that adopt Fine Arts will receive a Gallery in their first 4 cities, which provides 1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness as well as an Artist Specialist Slot.
Conservatory
Civilizations that adopt Fine Arts will receive a Conservatory in their first 4 cities, which provides 1 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism as well as a Musician Specialist Slot.
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]Conservatory
